Key Match Events: England fans' heroic support in the second half
Potential goal foiled by offside after Declan Rice's reverse pass
Kieran Trippier's dangerous cross leading to a near miss
Pre-Game Insights: England needed a performance to reinvigorate fans after previous matches
Gareth Southgate's leadership and midfield decisions
Post-Match Reflections: Fans turned on the team and manager Gareth Southgate due to frustration
England qualified top of Group C despite the draw
Southgate's ability to stabilize the team despite criticism
Miscellaneous Highlights: England's lack of penetration and inability to break down Slovenia's defense
Positive contributions from substitutes Kobbie Mainoo and Cole Palmer
